HealthKit calculates an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKStatistics] object for each [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityType], based on the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantitySample] objects collected by the workout builder.

# allStatistics

**Instance Property**

A dictionary that contains all the statistics for the workout builder.

## Declaration

```swift
var allStatistics: [HKQuantityType : HKStatistics] { get }
```

## Discussion

HealthKit calculates an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKStatistics] object for each [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityType], based on the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantitySample] objects collected by the workout builder.
title: allStatistics
